meta.videoTitle: How to Lose Fat with Science-Based Tools

title_en: Cost Free & Other Ways To Support Our Podcast, Making Sure We See Feedback
title_zh: 免费支持我们的播客，确保我们看到反馈的其他方式

paragraphList.text_en: To support our podcast and ensure that we continue to provide valuable content for our listeners, there are several ways you can engage with us and show your support. Your involvement is crucial in helping us grow and improve the quality of our podcast. If you have found our conversations on topics such as fat loss and fat metabolism insightful and beneficial, here are some ways you can help us:
paragraphList.text_zh: 为了支持我们的播客，并确保我们继续为听众提供有价值的内容，你可以通过几种方式与我们互动并表达支持。你的参与对帮助我们增长和提高播客质量至关重要。如果你觉得我们关于减肥和脂肪代谢等主题的对话富有见地且有益，以下是几种你可以帮助我们的方式：

paragraphList.text_en: First and foremost, subscribing to our podcast on platforms like YouTube, Apple, and Spotify is a simple yet effective way to support us. By subscribing, you not only stay updated on new episodes, but you also boost our visibility and reach. Additionally, on Apple Podcasts, leaving a five-star review and providing feedback in the comments section can greatly help us improve and tailor our content to better meet your needs and interests.
paragraphList.text_zh: 首先，订阅我们的播客在 YouTube、Apple 和 Spotify 等平台上是支持我们的一种简单而有效的方式。通过订阅，您不仅可以及时了解新的剧集，还可以增加我们的曝光度和影响力。此外，在 Apple Podcasts 上，给予五星评价并在评论部分提供反馈可以极大地帮助我们改进并调整我们的内容，以更好地满足您的需求和兴趣。

paragraphList.text_en: Your feedback is crucial to us. Whether you enjoyed a specific episode, have suggestions for future topics, or have any other comments, please don't hesitate to share your thoughts in the comment section on YouTube. Your feedback informs the direction of our podcast and ensures that we address topics that resonate with our audience.
paragraphList.text_zh: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。无论您是否喜欢某一集节目，对未来的主题有建议，或者有任何其他意见，请务必在YouTube的评论区分享您的想法。您的反馈决定了我们播客的发展方向，并确保我们涉及与受众共鸣的主题。

paragraphList.text_en: Furthermore, supporting our sponsors and partners, as well as considering our Patreon page, can also contribute to the growth and sustainability of our podcast. Checking out the products or services offered by our sponsors and exploring the option to become a patron on Patreon at www.patreon.com/andrewhuberman can provide additional avenues for helping us continue to create valuable content.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，支持我们的赞助商和合作伙伴，以及考虑我们的 Patreon 页面，也可以为我们的播客的增长和可持续性做出贡献。查看赞助商提供的产品或服务，并探索在 Patreon 上成为我们的赞助人的选项，网址为 www.patreon.com/andrewhuberman，可以为我们继续创造有价值的内容提供额外渠道。

paragraphList.text_en: For those interested in supplements, we have partnered with Thorne, known for their stringent quality standards and effective formulations. You can find the supplements mentioned in our podcast at Thorne's website, thorne.com/u/huberman, where you can enjoy a 20% discount on any Thorne supplements by using the provided link.
paragraphList.text_zh: 对于那些对保健品感兴趣的人，我们与著名的 Thorne 合作，他们以严格的质量标准和有效的配方而闻名。您可以在 Thorne 的网站 thorne.com/u/huberman 找到我们播客中提到的保健品，通过使用提供的链接，您可以享受 Thorne 所有保健品的 20% 折扣。

paragraphList.text_en: Your support and engagement play a vital role in the success of our podcast. We genuinely appreciate your time, attention, and interest in the scientific topics we discuss. Thank you for being a valuable part of our podcast community and for helping us grow and evolve as we continue to explore fascinating subjects together.
paragraphList.text_zh: 你的支持和参与对我们的播客成功起着至关重要的作用。我们真诚感激你花费的时间、关注和对我们讨论的科学话题的兴趣。感谢你成为我们播客社区中宝贵的一员，并在我们继续探讨有趣话题的同时，帮助我们成长和发展。
